div.span: This is the BAHIA SHIPPING SERVICES, INC. (BAHIA) Data Protection Policy which sets forth how we manages, collects, uses
and discloses your Personal Information, in accordance with the Philippine Data Privacy Act of 2012 (DPA).
This policy is in addition to your crew authorization and consent form to BAHIA in respect of your personal information.

In accordance with this issuance, we wish to notify you that BAHIA will collect your personal information when you sign up on our website, www.bahiashipping.ph in the course of your employment application. You agree and consent

on the collection, use and processing of your personal information in the manner set forth in this Privacy Policy which will be updated from time to time in accordance with the existing regulatory requirement of the Act.
Personal Information
Purposes of Personal Information Collected
Retention of Personal Information
Data Transfers
Data Sharing
Rights to Personal Information
Cookies
Contract

In this policy, personal information refers to any information, whether recorded in material form or not, that will directly ascertain the identity of the crew. This may include your name, age, date of birth, marital status, address, contact information (like telephone number, e-mail address), social security and other government identification numbers, and other data not directly taken from the crew but from third party thru databases and public sources like job title, skills, resume etc.

That my Personal Information will be stored in BAHIA's crew database (BMIS) and respective Principal's crew database on which you may be assigned. We will store your personal information for as long as it is necessary to fulfill the purpose for which it was collected at a minimum of 5 years from the date of last employment in case of dispute after which it will be destroyed.

We may also transfer your personal data from BAHIA (BMIS) crew databse to any of our direct and indirect parent or subsidiary or associated or affiliated company due to any of the purposes listed below
Purposes of collecting and processing of personal information shall at least meet one of the following circumstances:

ul.li: 1. Consent to collect and process personal data as a requirement in administering your employment or your application;
2. Protect your and another person's vital interest when necessary like in case of medical emergencies;
4. Legitimate interests - processing is necessary for the purposes of the legitimate interest

div.span: We share your personal information with our third party service providers to the extent necessary for them to provide their services such as but not limited to travel - related service partners, training centers and medical service providers.

You have the right to be informed, access your personal information or restrict or object to our processing of, you may request for a copy of some or all of your personal information thru writing to which you may be asked for the purposes of the request, subject to evaluation of your identity and purposes. You may also have the rights not to allow us to process your personal information if you believe that your personal information is incorrect and in which case, you may withdraw your consent to collect if no longer necessary to process.
If there's anything about our policies or your information you wish to clarify, or discuss, feel free to reach out to our Data Protection Officer on.
Email, dataprotection@bahiashipping..ph
